name: Surfers of Temple - Sword in the Stone
name_original: Surfers of Temple - Sword in the Stone
description:
A gang of boys chased by an angry wizard, a magic stone tower filled with deadly traps dangers and last but not least .... a tsunami of runners monsters to capture and destroy you without scruples.

A tower in an underground citadel in an awesome fantasy environment and action, escapes from the traps and monsters that inhabit it, a combination of runner and RPG style game that will make you enjoy each game. Go through all the rooms, from the mythical throne room to the shadows of the dungeons.

Few are the brave ones who have managed to overcome this feat at a crossroads go running alone will not save you. Shoot at a lot of objects that obstruct your path stone and do not fear to walk on the majestic stained carpets
by the shed blood of previous wars .... torches illuminate your way and choose which one you well take off the citadel and the magic tower.

Turn your gang in a true warriors teleported a medieval ambience, remote and ancient, Make them some real heroes of this story of adventure and magical fantasy. In your hands is, emerge victorious. Good luck!

* Fantastic recreation of medieval ambience
* Dynamic exterior and interior scenarios with different themed rooms with ascents and descents along the endless stairs
* Free to play, no in-app purchases
* Easy and intuitive touch gameplay, makes incredible twists, roll, jump, duck and shoot your powerful firearm.
* Soundtrack will make your heart throb.
* High quality and detailed 3D

Now, all you have to choose your character and start the battle!
